General.Name: Joby Aviation
General.Description: Joby Aviation, Inc., a vertically integrated air mobility company, engages in building an electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft optimized to deliver air transportation as a service in the United States and Dubai. The company intends to build an aerial ridesharing service, as well as developing an app-based platform that will enable consumers to book rides. Joby Aviation, Inc. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Santa Cruz, California.
General.Address: 333 Encinal Street, Santa Cruz, CA, United States, 95060
